attachments.title: Julia User & Developer Survey 2021
attachments.text: Itâ€™s time to conduct the third annual Julia User & Developer survey. Before we invite Julia users and developers to complete the survey, we invite you to review the survey questions and share any feedback you may have. The link is available here: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MgEcQ9VMZuYM1lx3QkALh9iHdEVq_YJt_tb7YmR5-NI/edit?usp=sharing> Once you are approved and have access to the survey, please insert comments directly in the Google doc. Thank you!

elements.text: Is this legit? The user has only 1 prior post on discourse and it seem weird that one needs to request access.

text: given he's the director of marketing and communications of :juliacomputing:  and the survey is run by :juliacomputing:  I'd assume so: <https://juliacomputing.com/about-us/>
